item.name: Nsslapd DB Abort Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of transactions that have been aborted.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Active Transactions
item.description: This attribute shows the number of transactions that are currently active.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Cache Hit
item.description: This attribute shows the requested pages found in the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Cache Region Wait Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of times that a thread of control was forced to wait before obtaining the region lock.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Cache Size Bytes
item.description: This attribute shows the total cache size in bytes.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Cache Try
item.description: This attribute shows the total cache lookups.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Clean Pages
item.description: This attribute shows the clean pages currently in the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Commit Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of transactions that have been committed.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Deadlock Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of deadlocks detected.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Dirty Pages
item.description: This attribute shows the dirty pages currently in the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Hash Buckets
item.description: This attribute shows the number of hash buckets in buffer hash table.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Hash Elements Examine Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the total number of hash elements traversed during hash table lookups.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Hash Search Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the total number of buffer hash table lookups.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Lock Conflicts
item.description: This attribute shows the total number of locks not immediately available due to conflicts.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Lock Region Wait Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of times that a thread of control was forced to wait before obtaining the region lock.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Lockers
item.description: This attribute shows the number of current lockers.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Log Bytes Since Checkpoint
item.description: This attribute shows the number of bytes written to this log since the last checkpoint.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Log Write Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of megabytes and bytes written to this log.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Longest Chain Length
item.description: This attribute shows the longest chain ever encountered in buffer hash table lookups.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page Create Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the pages created in the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page Read Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the pages read into the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page RO Evict Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the clean pages forced from the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page RW Evict Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the dirty pages forced from the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page Trickle Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the dirty pages written using the memp_trickle interface.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Page Write Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the pages written into the cache.

item.name: Nsslapd DB Pages In Use
item.description: This attribute shows all pages, clean or dirty, currently in use.

item.name: Nsslapd DB TXN Region Wait Rate
item.description: This attribute shows the number of times that a thread of control was force to wait before obtaining the region lock.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME} File Cache Hit
item_prototype.description: This attribute gives the name of the file and provides a sequential integer identifier (starting at 0) for the file. All associated statistics for the file are given this same numerical identifier.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME} File Cache Miss
item_prototype.description: This attribute gives the number of times that a search requiring data from this file was performed and that the data could not be obtained from the cache.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME} File Pages In
item_prototype.description: This attribute gives the number of pages brought to the cache from this file.

item_prototype.name: {#DBNAME} File Pages Out
item_prototype.description: This attribute gives the number of pages for this file written from cache to disk.

trigger.name: DN Cache Ratio too high
trigger.description: DN Cache Ratio is above {$CACHE_RATIO_MAX} performance may be degraded. Consider increasing nsslapd-dncachememsize

trigger.name: Entry Cache ratio too high
trigger.description: Entry Cache Ratio is above {$CACHE_RATIO_MAX} performance may be degraded. Consider increasing nsslapd-cachememsize

trigger.name: SLAPD is using swap memory
trigger.description: Performance is degraded when SLAPD begins swapping, for optimal performance this should not happen.

trigger.name: SLAPD is using too much memory
trigger.description: SLAPD (LDAP server process) is using more than {$SLAPD_PERCENT_MAX} percent of total memory.

graph.name: slapd swap use and memory percentage
